text: Ezɨ Elisa Gehasi mɨgɨa ghaze, “Nɨ kamaghɨn amizimɨn azaragh, ‘Bar guizbangɨra, nɨ ingangarir ekiam gamua gan akura. E bizir tizim damigh, nɨn akurvazir aghuim ikaragham? Elisa ti mangɨ atrivim o mɨdorozir gumazibar dapanimɨn azaraghtɨ, aning nɨ bagh bizir aghuitam damuam? Nɨ kamaghɨn ifongez, o?’ ”
